an5.38:4.3: Ye te, bhikkhave, loke santo sappurisā te saddhaññeva paṭhamaṃ anukampantā anukampanti, no tathā assaddhaṃ;
an5.38:4.4: saddhaññeva paṭhamaṃ upasaṅkamantā upasaṅkamanti, no tathā assaddhaṃ;
an5.38:4.5: saddhaññeva paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantā paṭiggaṇhanti, no tathā assaddhaṃ;
an5.38:4.6: saddhaññeva paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desentā desenti, no tathā assaddhaṃ;
an5.38:4.7: saddho kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
an5.38:4.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca saddhe kulaputte ānisaṃsā.
an5.38:5.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, subhūmiyaṃ catumahāpathe mahānigrodho samantā pakkhīnaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti;
an5.38:5.2: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, saddho kulaputto bahuno janassa paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānanti.
